title: Star Trek: Discovery
plot: Ten years before Kirk, Spock, and the Enterprise, the USS Discovery discovers new worlds and lifeforms as one Starfleet officer learns to understand all things alien.
awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 12 wins & 51 nominations.
stars: Sonequa Martin-Green, Doug Jones, Anthony Rapp, Mary Wiseman
companies: CBS Television Studios, Living Dead Guy Productions, Master Key Production

tagline: At the edge of the universe, discovery begins. (Season 1)

similars.title: Star Trek: Picard
similars.plot: Follow-up series to Star Trek: The Next Generation (1987) and Star Trek: Nemesis (2002) that centers on Jean-Luc Picard (Sir Patrick Stewart) in the next chapter of his life.
similars.stars: Patrick Stewart, Alison Pill, Isa Briones

similars.title: Star Trek: Voyager
similars.plot: Pulled to the far side of the galaxy, where the Federation is seventy-five years away at maximum warp speed, a Starfleet ship must cooperate with Maquis rebels to find a way home.
similars.stars: Kate Mulgrew, Robert Beltran, Roxann Dawson

similars.title: Star Trek: Enterprise
similars.plot: A century before Captain Kirk's five-year mission, Jonathan Archer captains the United Earth ship Enterprise during the early years of Starfleet, leading up to the Earth-Romulan War and the formation of the Federation.
similars.stars: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock

similars.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine
similars.plot: In the vicinity of the liberated planet of Bajor, the Federation space station Deep Space Nine guards the opening of a stable wormhole to the far side of the galaxy.
similars.stars: Avery Brooks, Rene Auberjonois, Cirroc Lofton

similars.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
similars.plot: Set almost 100 years after Captain Kirk's five-year mission, a new generation of Starfleet officers set off in the U.S.S. Enterprise-D on their own mission to go where no one has gone before.
similars.stars: Patrick Stewart, Brent Spiner, Jonathan Frakes

similars.title: Star Trek: The Original Series
similars.plot: In the 23rd Century, Captain James T. Kirk and the crew of the U.S.S. Enterprise explore the galaxy and defend the United Federation of Planets.
similars.stars: William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley

similars.title: Star Trek: Short Treks
similars.plot: A series of stand-alone short films featuring characters and storylines from Star Trek: Discovery (2017).
similars.stars: Anson Mount, Ethan Peck, Rebecca Romijn

similars.title: Star Trek: Lower Decks
similars.plot: The support crew serving on one of Starfleet's least important ships, the U.S.S. Cerritos, have to keep up with their duties, often while the ship is being rocked by a multitude of sci-fi anomalies.
similars.stars: Tawny Newsome, Jack Quaid, Noël Wells

similars.title: Star Trek: Nemesis
similars.plot: The Enterprise is diverted to the Romulan homeworld Romulus, supposedly because they want to negotiate a peace treaty. Captain Picard and his crew discover a serious threat to the Federation once Praetor Shinzon plans to attack Earth.
similars.stars: Patrick Stewart, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner

similars.title: Star Trek: First Contact
similars.plot: The Borg travel back in time intent on preventing Earth's first contact with an alien species. Captain Picard and his crew pursue them to ensure that Zefram Cochrane makes his maiden flight reaching warp speed.
similars.stars: Patrick Stewart, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner

similars.title: Stargate SG-1
similars.plot: A secret military team, SG-1, is formed to explore other planets through the recently discovered Stargates.
similars.stars: Richard Dean Anderson, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping

similars.title: The Expanse
similars.plot: In the 24th century, a disparate band of antiheroes unravel a vast conspiracy that threatens the Solar System's fragile state of cold war.
similars.stars: Wes Chatham, Dominique Tipper, Steven Strait
